  • java.lang.Object

extends SchedulerReady
    Author:
    Loris Friedel

    • Constructor Detail

      • SoundPlayer

        public SoundPlayer()

    • Method Detail

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate()
        Deactivate the sound play. No sound can be played until it has been reactivated.

      • reactivate

        public void reactivate()
        Reactive the sound player. The player is in its normal state after a call of this method.

      • forcePlay

        public void forcePlay(Sound sound)
        Force the given sound to be played by the player: If a previous sound was playing, force it to stop.
        Parameters:
        sound - sound to play no matter what.

      • stopPlay

        public void stopPlay()
        Force the current playing sound to stop.

      • enqueue

        public void enqueue(Sound sound)
        Add the given sound to the sound queue of the player. This method does not check if the player is currently playing sounds.
        Parameters:
        sound - Sound to add to the playlist queue.

      • playAll

        public void playAll(java.util.List<Sound> soundList)
        Enqueue all the given sounds and play the playlist. Stop the player before playing the playlist.
        Parameters:
        soundList - sounds to play.

      • playAll

        public void playAll(java.util.List<Sound> soundList,
                    java.lang.Runnable onFinish)
        Enqueue all the given sounds and play the playlist. Stop the player before playing the playlist. Run the given runnable at the end of the playlist, when all sound have been played.
        Parameters:
        soundList - sounds to play.
        onFinish - runnable to run when the playlist end.

      • playQueue

        public void playQueue()
        Play all sound that are currently in the playlist of the sound player. Does not stop any previous play of the player.

      • playQueue

        public void playQueue(java.lang.Runnable onFinish)
        Play all sound that are currently in the playlist of the sound player. Does not stop any previous play of the player. Run the given runnable at the end of the playlist, when all sound have been played.
        Parameters:
        onFinish - runnable to run a the end of the playlist.

      • flushQueue

        public void flushQueue()
        Stop and clear the sound queue.

      • stopQueue

        public void stopQueue()
        Force the playlist to stop being played.
